REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2129 reute r f BC-TEMPO-<TPO>-TO-SELL-C 03-19 0045

TEXT.TITLE: TEMPO <TPO> TO SELL CABLE SYSTEMS TO EAGLE
TEXT.BODY: Tempo Enterprises Inc said it signed a letter of intent to sell seven cable television systems, representing about 5,000 subscribers, to <Eagle Cable>. Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed. Reuter
